title: Mahjong Games Collection
description:
MEGA MAHJONG: you can fresh install or run the game from folder or do both, no conflict...if you run it from folder you&#039;ll see additional layouts, I modified it, deleted some tilesets and added all layouts from "mahjong endless journey" game...keep mounted the iso when you&#039;re playing the game... 

KYODAI MAHJONG:final version with key included, same issue here, you can run it from folder or fresh install...if you run from folder you&#039;ll see additional layouts and tilesets, I collected some pictures from various sources and edited...I&#039;ve also included tilesets and layouts separetely, in case of if you don&#039;t like my options... 

MAHJONG TOWERS ETERNITY:I added extra tilesets and downloaded some new layouts, run directly from folder, you can delete user name when you open the game from players option... 

I&#039;m really a fan of mahjong games and I wanted to share these modified games with you, I hope you enjoy...
